name: custom-icon-badges
description: Allows users to more easily use their own icons and logos in shields.io badges
author: Jonah Lawrence

scripts.start-server: npm run lint && tsc && NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-specifier-resolution=node --require dotenv/config' node dist/index.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-client && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run start-server" "npm run start --prefix client"
